monster.name: Clockwork Soldier

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The clockwork soldier is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The clockwork soldier has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The clockwork soldier's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the clockwork soldier dies, it explodes. Each creature within 5 feet of it must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The clockwork soldier makes two longsword or mouth gun attacks .

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Mouth Gun
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 10/120 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) damage.

trait.name: 10 (0)	10 (+0) 1 (-5)
entries: Saving Throws Str +11, Dex +5
Skills Athletics +8, Perception +6
Damage Immunities poison, psychic
Condition Immunities {@condition charmed}, {@condition exhaustion}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition paralyzed}, {@condition petrified}, {@condition poisoned}
Senses darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 16
Languages understands Common
Challenge 6 (2,300 XP)
Special Traits

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The clockwork myrmidon is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The clockwork myrmidon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The clockwork myrmidon makes two attacks: two pick attacks or two slam attacks, or one of each.

action.name: Heavy Pick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d12 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Alchemical Flame Jet {@recharge 5}
entries: The clockwork myrmidon can spew a jet of alchemical fire in a line 20 feet long and 5 feet wide. Any creature in the path of the jet takes 26 ({@damage 4d12}) fire damage, or half damage with a successful {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw. The clockwork myrmidon can use this attack four times before its internal reservoir is emptied.

action.name: Grease Spray {@recharge 5}
entries: As a bonus action, the clockwork myrmidon's chest can fire a spray of alchemical grease with a range of 30 feet, covering a 10-by-10 foot square area and turning it into difficult terrain. Each creature standing in the affected area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}. A creature that enters the area or ends its turn there must also succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}. The clockwork myrmidon can use this attack four times before its internal reservoir is emptied.

action.name: Alchemical Fireball
entries: The clockwork myrmidon's alchemical flame reservoir explodes when the construct is destroyed, spraying nearby creatures with burning fuel. A creature within 5 feet of the myrmidon takes 19 ({@damage 3d12}) fire damage, or half damage with a successful {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw. This explosion doesn't occur if the clockwork myrmidon has already fired its alchemical flame jet four times.
About
This hulking brass and iron creature resembles a giant suit of plate armor; a constant growl issues from its midsection. It stands 9 feet tall and its squat head wears an angry expression.
A clockwork myrmidon always moves with moves with a powerful, determined grace unusual in most clockwork creations.

action.name: Elite Machines
entries: Clockwork myrmidons are heavily armored at their joints and at most vital parts. They are much too valuable to undertake patrols or menial labor, and they are unleashed only for dangerous situations that clockwork watchmen cannot handle.

action.name: Single Targets
entries: A clockwork myrmidon defends itself but does not initiate combat unless so directed by its master. When it does enter battle, a clockwork myrmidon is unrelenting and single-minded, and it attacks one particular target until that foe surrenders, escapes, or is defeated. Unless given other instructions, a clockwork myrmidon attacks whatever enemy is closest to it. A clockwork myrmidon attacks until destroyed or ordered to stand down.

action.name: Alchemical Tricks
entries: A clockwork myrmidon is always outfitted with alchemical fire, acids, grease, and other special devices. An alchemist is required to keep one running well.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The veteran makes two longsword attacks. If it has a shortsword drawn, it can also make a shortsword attack.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) piercing damage.

immune.note: from nonmagical weapons that aren't adamantine condition immunities charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned senses darkvision 60 ft., passive perception 16 languages understands the languages of its creator but can't speak spare slots 1 challenge 7 (2,900 xp)

trait.name: Burst Dash Executor can dash as a bonus action
entries: As a part of the bonus action used to dash, the executor can attempt to grapple any creature it moves within 5 feet of during its dash.

Marksman Executor does not receive disadvantage on ranged attacks if the target is within 5 feet of it or {@condition prone}. It also receives a bonus +5 to ranged attack and damage rolls (included in its attacks).
Spare Parts Spare parts from executor grant a long barreled cannon to any who attach them. The cannon has half the range of 20/60 feet and deals
{@damage 2d8} bludgeoning damage. The construct is considered proficient with this weapon and they may use it in place of any of their attacks.
Actions
Multiattack The executor makes two attacks, one with its slam and one with its triple barrel cannon.

trait.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit. 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage.

trait.name: Triple Barrel Cannon
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage. A creature damaged by this attack must succeed a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

monster.name: Clockwork Lineholder

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The clockwork lineholder is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The clockwork lineholder has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The clockwork lineholder's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The clockwork lineholder makes two halberd attacks.

action.name: Halberd
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage and 7 ({@damage 2d6}) lightning damage.

reaction.name: Shield Block
entries: The clockwork lineholder adds 2 to its

AC against one melee attack that would hit it. If the attack hits nevertheless the damage is reduced by 7 ({@dice 1d6 + 3}) points of damage. To do so, the lineholder must see the attacker and be wielding a shield.

monster.name: Clockwork Pacifier

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The clockwork pacifier is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The clockwork pacifier has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The clockwork pacifier's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Lightning Overload
entries: Whenever the clockwork pacifier is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The clockwork pacifier makes two slam attacks or fires two lightning bolts.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Lightning Bolt
entries: Range Weapon Attack: {@hit 6} to hit, range 90ft., one target, {@h}15 ({@damage 3d8 + 2}) lightning damage and the target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, or become {@condition stunned} until the end of the pacifier next turn.

action.name: Pacifying Field {@recharge 5}
entries: An electric field raises around the pacifier. Each creature in a 20-foot cube originating from the pacifier must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) lightning damage and falls {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition unconscious}. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monster.name: Clockwork Mage

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The clockwork mage is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The clockwork mage has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The clockwork mage's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Silent Caster
entries: The clockwork mage doesn't need verbal components to cast spells.

trait.name: Quickened Cast
entries: When the clockwork mage casts a spell that has a casting time of 1 action, it may instead change the casting time to 1 bonus action.

trait.name: Wand Magic
entries: The clockwork mage's crystal wand allows it to cast spells, requiring no material components. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom

trait.name: (spell save {@dc 15})
entries: The arcane school of the wand determines the color of the crystal and the clockwork's spells:
Abjuration (blue).
At will: absorb elements, shield
3/day each: lesser restoration, pass without trace
1/day each: counterspell
Conjuration (orange).
At will: entangle, grease
3/day each: misty step, web
1/day each: stinking cloud
Enchantment (yellow).
At will: bane, sleep
3/day each: crown of madness, hold person
1/day each: confusion
Evocation (red).
At will: magic missile, thunderwave
3/day each: gust of wind, scorching ray
1/day each: fireball
Illusion (purple).
At will: color spray, disguise self
3/day each: blur, invisibility
1/day each: hypnotic pattern
Necromancy (black).
At will: inflict wounds, ray of sickness
3/day each: blindness/deafness, ray of enfeeblement
1/day each: bestow curse
Transmutation (green).
At will: expeditious retreat, catapult
3/day each: enlarge/reduce, spider climb
1/day each: haste

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The clockwork mage makes four slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 3d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Arcane Conversion {@recharge}
entries: The clockwork mage uses its magical abilities to change the arcane school of its crystal wand. Roll a {@dice d6} to determine the new school, removing the current one from the list of possibilities. The clockwork mage regains the use of all its spells.

monster.name: Clockwork Goliath

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The clockwork goliath is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The clockwork goliath has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The clockwork goliath's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Lightning Overload
entries: Whenever the clockwork goliath is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt. In addition, it regains the use of its charged impact.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The clockwork goliath makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Charged Impact {@recharge 5}
entries: Melee Weapon

Attack: {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) lightning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 15 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}.

monster.name: Tesla. Sentinel

immune.note: from nonmagical weapons that aren't adamantine

languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak Spare Slots 1

trait.name: Conductor Metal
entries: Any creature who damages the sentinel with a melee weapon or spell attack takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) lightning damage.

trait.name: Current Intake
entries: Whenever the golem is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt. Additionally, he can immeditely can attempet to recharge Discharge ability as a reaction

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Infallible Optics
entries: The sentinel can see {@condition invisible} creatures and objects, see through visual illusions, and perceive the original form of a shapechanger or a creature that is transformed by magic.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
Magic Weapons The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Spare Parts
entries: The sentinel's spare parts grant any melee weapon attack an additional 7 ({@damage 2d6}) lightning damage.

action.name: Multiattack The sentinel makes two slam attacks
Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) lightning damage.

action.name: Discharge {@recharge 5}
entries: The sentinel unleashes an electric current in a 15-foot radius. Each creature in that area must make a DC X Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) lightning damage on a failed save and becoming {@condition stunned} until the end of their next turn, or half as much damage on a successful one and not {@condition stunned}.

reaction.name: Current Intake
entries: As a reaction Tesla Sentinel can attempt to recharge Discharge ability if he takes lightning damage.

trait.name: Albino Dwarven Resilience
entries: The albino dwarf has advantage on saving throws against poison and lightning.

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) slashing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The dwarf's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Albino Dwarven Resilience
entries: The albino dwarf has advantage on saving throws against poison and lightning.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistence
entries: The clockwork bawler has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The clockwork brawler's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The clockwork brawler makes two unarmed strikes.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Knockout{@recharge 4}
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

Target Creature must succed on a DC15 Constitution saving Throw or fall unconcious for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each turns, ending the effect on itself on a success

reaction.name: Sweep Kick
entries: When a creature misses the clockwork brawler with a melee attack, the brawler can use its reaction to make a unarmed strike against the creature. If it hits, the attack deals normal damage and the creature falls {@condition prone}.

Clockwork brawlers are a powerful foe constructed by dwarves as personal protectors. Clockwork brawlers have a humanoid but have large arms and big hands that they use to strike, was one of the first mechanical constructs made by dwarves, first to work on constructions, but then they were modificated and used for protection.

monster.name: Clockwork Bomber

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The clockwork bomber is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The clockwork bomber has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The clockwork bomber's weapon attacks are considered magical, unless against raged barbarians.

action.name: Self Destruction
entries: Unless specifically programmed otherwise by its creator, a clockwork bomber explodes if it is destroyed.  Each creature in a 5 foot radius around the clockwork spy must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 3 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one.
Clockwork Bomber can self destruct anytime even if it's not destroyed.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6}) slashing damage.

monster.name: Duruk Virgo

trait.name: Part Mechanic
entries: Duruk has improved himself with some machanical parts, therefore he have resistance to lightning and necrotic damage, and have advantage on these types saving throws

trait.name: Shock Collar
entries: Duruk uses a collar that gives a small shock if he is acting against his will, like being {@condition charmed}, mind controlled, or similar effects.

action.name: Boomstick ammunition 2
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 5/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage in melee, or 3 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage at range.

reaction.name: Shield
entries: An {@condition invisible} barrier of magical force appears and protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from magic missile.

legendaryHeader: Duruk is not a fighter or warrior of any type, likewise he fights using gimmicks and can make two legendary actions per round that are:

legendary.name: Drop Colockwork Bomber
entries: Duruk Virgo can summon two Clockwork Bombers in an unoccupied space you can see within 15ft range, that acts in his turn.

legendary.name: Throw Water Bottle + Shokcing Grasp or Witch Bolt
entries: Duruk Virgo throw a water bottle making the target terrain and 5ft adjacent terrain wet, characters occupying that spaces must make a DC13 Dexterity Svaing Throw or become wet.
Wet terrain conduct lightning spells, and wet characters takes {@damage 1d8} damage when hit by lightning damage of any type and have  disadvantage to lightning abilities or spell saving throws.

trait.name: Albino Dwarven Resilience
entries: The albino dwarf has advantage on saving throws against poison and lightning.

action.name: Lightning Lance
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit (with disadvantage if the target is within 5 feet of the user), reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d12 + 2}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) lightning damage

action.name: Lightning Spray {@recharge 5}
entries: From its lightning lance, the dwarf shoots a 15-foot cone of lightning or a line of fire 30 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) lightning e damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
If the creature fails the saving throw, it cannot do reactions until it's it turn again.

action.name: Invisibility (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The dwarf magically turns {@condition invisible} for up to 1 hour or until it attacks, it casts a spell, it uses its Enlarge, or its concentration is broken (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the duergar wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with it.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The soldier is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Intimidating Legions
entries: A single clockwork soldier's rigid movements appear silly, but, when gathered in numbers, they become an inhuman terror. When the clockwork soldier makes a Charisma (Intimidation) check, it gains a bonus on that check equal to the number of other clockwork soldiers the target can see or hear.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The soldier has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Halberd
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Overdrive Flurry {@recharge}
entries: The soldier makes four halberd attacks. After taking this action, it is {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.
About

The halberd-wielding soldier is made of brass and iron and stands head-and-shoulders taller than any human soldier. Steam hisses from valves at its joints, and its face is an iron mask of sharp angles and intimidating steel teeth.

action.name: Mighty but Linear
entries: Clockwork soldiers are shock troops deployed by some human and dwarven societies. These soldiers can strike hard and quickly but are poorly armored and susceptible to burning out their internal furnace. Their rudimentary mechanical minds are sufficient for front-line fodder but wholly unsuited for more fluid situationsâ€”in these cases they require orders from living officers.

action.name: Mouth Gun
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 10/120 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) damage.

trait.name: Hidden Potential
entries: Each time a spare part is given to the scrapper, it gains an additional effect based on how many parts it currently has equipped: 1 spare part: AC increases by 2 2 spare parts: Movement increases by 10 feet. 3 spare parts: Gains an additional unarmed strike attack as a part of its attack action.

entries: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d12 + 3}) slashing damage.

reaction.name: Sudden Lunge
entries: If an enemy moves within 10 feet of the zombie, roll a {@dice d20}. If the roll is 11 or higher, the zombie moves up to 5 feet toward the enemy. If the zombie ends within 5 feet of the target, the zombie can make one melee weapon attack against it.

entries: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

reaction.name: Sudden Lunge
entries: If an enemy moves within 10 feet of the zombie, roll a {@dice d20}. If the roll is 11 or higher, the zombie moves up to 5 feet toward the enemy. If the zombie ends within 5 feet of the target, the zombie can make one melee weapon attack against it.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the bugbear hits with it (included in the attack).

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

entries: If an enemy moves within 10 feet of the zombie, roll a {@dice d20}. If the roll is 11 or higher, the zombie moves up to 5 feet toward the enemy. If the zombie ends within 5 feet of the target, the zombie can make one melee weapon attack against it.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 ({@damage 1d4 - 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) slashing damage.

reaction.name: Sudden Lunge
entries: If an enemy moves within 10 feet of the zombie, roll a {@dice d20}. If the roll is 11 or higher, the zombie moves up to 5 feet toward the enemy. If the zombie ends within 5 feet of the target, the zombie can make one melee weapon attack against it.

trait.name: Multiattack
entries: Can do Three LongSword Attacks after he do this once, he can only do again after a short rest. (Action Surge)
Until the short rest, he can do two attacks normaly with his Main and off Hand.

action.name: Long Sword
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) damage.

action.name: Action Surge
entries: (extra action in turn once betw. short rests)

action.name: Combat Superiority
entries: four {@dice 1d8} Superiority dice

action.name: Maneuvers Known
entries: â€¢ Feinting Attack (bonus action to gain adv. on attack):
superiority dice ;
â€¢ Precision Attack (add die to attack):

When you make a weapon attack roll against a creature, you can expend one superiority die to add it to the roll. You can use this maneuver before or after making the attack roll, but before any effects of the attack are applied.;
â€¢ Riposte (reaction attack when foe misses):

When a creature misses you with a melee attack, you can use your reaction and expend one superiority die to make a melee weapon attack against the creature. If you hit, you add the superiority die to the attack's damage roll.

action.name: Second Wind (regain 1d10+3 h.p.
entries: (regain {@dice 1d10 + 3} h.p.)
On your turn, you can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d10} + your fighter level.
Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The kuo-toa is a 2nd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). The kuo-toa has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Otherworldly Perception
entries: The kuo-toa can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is {@condition invisible} or on the Ethereal Plane. It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

trait.name: Slippery
entries: The kuo-toa has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Can make two attacks

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) damage.

action.name: Sling
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, unlimited range, one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) damage.

action.name: Wild Shape - 1 - Criclo of Moon
entries: you can use your action to magically assume the shape of a beast that you have seen before. You can use this feature twice.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The croaker can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
entries: The croaker can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The croaker's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Swamp Camouflage
entries: The croaker has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Glaaar-pat (3/Day)
entries: The croaker sings a song of marshy doom. Each chosen creature within 30 feet of the croaker that can hear the song must make a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw, taking 9 ({@damage 2d8}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this saving throw also has disadvantage on Constitution saving throws until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Rooooo-glog (1/Day)
entries: The croaker sings an ode to an elder froghemoth. Each bullywug within 30 feet of the croaker that can hear the song gains 10 temporary hit points.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the bugbear hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If the bugbear surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage from the attack.

action.name: Two-Handed Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d10 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Action Surge
entries: extra action in turn once betw. short rests

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Volatile
entries: When the goblin takes damage that is not poison or psychic damage, roll {@dice 1d20}. On a roll of 1 to 5, the goblin's alchemical pack explodes. The goblin and each creature within 10 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 ({@damage 5d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The goblin has disadvantage on its saving throw.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Acid Flask
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 5/20 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage.

action.name: Goblin Molotov
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 20 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) fire damage and the target catches fire, taking 2 ({@damage 1d4}) fire damage at the end of each of its turns. An affected creature or another creature within 5 feet of it can take an action to extinguish the fire. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and doesn't catch fire.

action.name: Tangleweb
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 20 ft., one creature. {@h}The creature must succeed on a {@dc 11} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} by sticky web-like adhesive. As an

action.name: escaping from the tangleweb on a success
entries: The effect ends if the tangleweb is destroyed. The tangleweb has AC 10, 5 hit points, resistance to bludgeoning damage, and immunity to poison and psychic damage.

action.name: Double Lob {@recharge 5}
entries: The goblin can make two ranged weapon attacks.

trait.name: Multiattack
entries: Can do Three Battleaxe Attacks after he do this once, he can only do again after a short rest. (Action Surge)
Until the short rest, he can do two attacks normaly with his Main and off Hand.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) damage.

action.name: Action Surge
entries: (extra action in turn once betw. short rests)

action.name: Combat Superiority
entries: four {@dice 1d8} Superiority dice

action.name: Maneuvers Known
entries: â€¢ Feinting Attack (bonus action to gain adv. on attack):
superiority dice ;
â€¢ Precision Attack (add die to attack):

When you make a weapon attack roll against a creature, you can expend one superiority die to add it to the roll. You can use this maneuver before or after making the attack roll, but before any effects of the attack are applied.;
â€¢ Riposte (reaction attack when foe misses):

When a creature misses you with a melee attack, you can use your reaction and expend one superiority die to make a melee weapon attack against the creature. If you hit, you add the superiority die to the attack's damage roll.

action.name: Second Wind (regain 1d10+3 h.p.
entries: (regain {@dice 1d10 + 3} h.p.)
On your turn, you can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d10} + your fighter level.
Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: BattleAxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Sudden Lunge
entries: If an enemy moves within 10 feet of the zombie, roll a {@dice d20}. If the roll is 11 or higher, the zombie moves up to 5 feet toward the enemy. If the zombie ends within 5 feet of the target, the zombie can make one melee weapon attack against it.

monster.name: Duruk's Homunculus
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Telepathic Bond
entries: While the homunculus is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}1 piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is instead {@condition poisoned} for 5 ({@dice 1d10}) minutes and {@condition unconscious} while {@condition poisoned} in this way.

action.name: Alchemical Acid
entries: As an action, Homunculus can reach a vial of acid, and hurl the vial at a creature or object within 30 feet of him . The vial shatters on impact. A creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 1d6} acid damage. An object automatically takes that damage, and the damage is maximized.

action.name: Alchemical Fire
entries: As an action, Homunculus can reach a vial of volatile liquid, and hurl the vial at a creature, object, or surface within 30 feet of him . On impact, the vial detonates in a 5-foot radius. Any creature in that area must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 1d6} fire damage.

action.name: Smoke Stick
entries: As an action, Homunculus can reach a stick that produces a thick plume of smoke. You can hold on to the stick or throw it to a point up to 30 feet away as part of the action used to produce it. The area in a 10-foot radius around the stick is filled with thick smoke that blocks vision, once the vision is blocked and not darkened, darkvision or truesight don't work on this smoke. Creatures have disvantage attacking any other creature inside the smoke.
The stick and smoke persist for 1 minute and then disappear. After using this formula, you can't do so again for 1 minute.

action.name: Tanglefoot
entries: As an action, Homunculus can reach a bag filled with writhing, sticky black tar and hurl it at a point on the ground within 30 feet of him (the bag and its contents disappear if you don't hurl the bag by the end of the current turn). The bag bursts on impact and covers the ground in a 5-foot radius with sticky goo. That area becomes difficult terrain for 1 minute, and any creature that starts its turn on the ground in that area has its speed halved for that turn. After using this formula, you can't do so again for 1 minute

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: Huruk can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide actions as a bonus action on its turn.

trait.name: Fancy Footwork
entries: During the privateer's turn, if it makes a melee attack against a creature, that creature cannot make opportunity attacks against it until the end of the privateer's turn.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The privateer deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of the privateer and the privateer doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Gnome Cunning.
entries: Huruk has advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

trait.name: Magic Resistance.
entries: Huruk has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Huruk makes two attacks.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Flintlock Pistol
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Smoke Stick.
entries: As an action, Huruk can reach a stick that produces a thick plume of smoke. You can hold on to the stick or throw it to a point up to 30 feet away as part of the action used to produce it. The area in a 10-foot radius around the stick is filled with thick smoke that blocks vision, once the vision is blocked and not darkened, darkvision or truesight don't work on this smoke. Creatures have disvantage attacking any other creature inside the smoke.
The stick and smoke persist for 1 minute and then disappear. After using this formula, you can't do so again for 1 minute.
IrmÃ£o de Duruk

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The lizardfolk can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

trait.name: Indomitable (1/Day)
entries: The lizardfolk rerolls a failed saving throw.

trait.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus

trait.name: Mirsack Brothers Bound
entries: All magical damage is divided among the brothers if they stay 100ft of each other, all heal is divided the same way.

trait.name: Mirsack's Rage
entries: If a Mirsack brother dies or is put out of combat, the other will enter in blind rage.

Once in rage, he have immunity to any imparing movment, to charm, any mind or body control effect and every damage he does will do{@dice  + 1d6}. He will always goes first after the one who killed his brother, if he manage to put it out of combat the rage will end.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lizardfolk makes three melee attacks, one with its bite and two with its battleaxe.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The lizardfolk is a 7th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The lizardfolk can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

trait.name: Mirsack Brothers Bound.
entries: All magical damage is divided among the brothers if they stay 100ft of each other, all heal is divided the same way.

trait.name: Mirsack's Rage.
entries: If a Mirsack brother dies or is put out of combat, the other will enter in blind rage.

Once in rage, he have immunity to any imparing movment, to charm, any mind or body control effect and every damage he does will do{@dice  + 1d6}. He will always goes first after the one who killed his brother, if he manage to put it out of combat the rage will end.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lizardfolk makes two melee attacks, each one with a different weapon.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Heavy Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Spiked Shield
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The lizardfolk can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

trait.name: Stealthy
entries: On each of its turns, the lizardfolk can use a bonus action to take the Hide action.

trait.name: Slay Foe (1/Turn)
entries: The lizardfolk deals an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) damage with its weapon attack if it hits a creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Swamp Strider
entries: Moving through nonmagical difcult marshy terrain doesn't cost the lizardfolk extra movement.

trait.name: Mirsack Brothers Bound.
entries: All magical damage is divided among the brothers if they stay 100ft of each other, all heal is divided the same way.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lizardfolk makes two melee attacks, each one with a different weapon.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Sleeping Arrow
entries: Creature hit by this arrow have to succeed a DC14 constitution saving throw or become {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute. A creature can  make an action to try to wake up the {@condition unconscious} creature, that must succeed in another DC14 CON saving throw or continue to be unconsious, the difficult of the test will increase by 1 for each falied attempt to wake up.

action.name: Improved invisibilty
entries: Fretyr can use invisibilty spell as a bonus action

trait.name: Lightfooted
entries: The hobgoblin can take the Dash or Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Sharpshooter
entries: The hobgoblin's ranged weapon attacks ignore half cover and three-quarters cover and attacking at long range doesn't impose disadvantage on the hobgoblin's ranged weapon attack rolls.

trait.name: Steady Aim (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, Drakral takes careful aim at a creature it can see within range of its ranged weapon. Until the end of its turn, the hobgoblin deals an an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage with each of its ranged weapon attacks against the target.

trait.name: Martial Advantage (1/Turn)
entries: Drakral can deal an extra 10 ({@damage 2d10}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin and that ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hobgoblin makes two shortsword attacks or two longbow attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Dodge
entries: If Drakral is attacked, he can take the Dodge action

trait.name: Lightfooted
entries: The hobgoblin can take the Dash or Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Martial Advantage (1/Turn)
entries: The hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin and that ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hobgoblin makes two shortsword attacks or two longbow attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. {@h}15 ({@damage 6d4}) piercing damage, or 5 ({@damage 3d4}) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The drow guard's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 10}). The drow guard can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The drow guard has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put The drow guard to sleep.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the drow guard has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage, or 15 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Ganglord's Presence
entries: A goblin ally that starts its turn with 30 feet of this goblin and can see and hear this goblin deals an extra 3 ({@dice 1d6}) damage on its weapon damage rolls against a creature if at least two of the goblin's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The goblin deals an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the goblin that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the goblin doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The goblin makes two scimitar attacks.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

reaction.name: Redirect Attack
entries: When a creature the goblin can see targets it with an attack, the goblin chooses another goblin within 5 feet of it. The two goblins swap places, and the chosen goblin becomes the target instead.
